p: The present study was conducted at Viral Research and Diagnostic Laboratory (VRDL), Department of Microbiology, JNIMS, Porompat, Imphal East, Manipur during a time of three (3) years from January 2016 to December 2018. VRDL was set up by Department of Health Research (DHR), Government of India and Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) under process of establishing a network of virology diagnostic laboratories in the country with an aim of strengthening laboratory capacity in the country for timely identification of viral diseases and other agents causing significant morbidity.
